trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around December 4th 2000
divs: Sighting Detailsat 9:36pm on march 4, 2001, i was waiting for a bus at the corner of SE 82nd andFoster in Portland, OR. i had noticed a bright red light in the sky to thenorthwest. i thought it was a plane, but it didnt move or blink. i then thoughtof a star, but it was raining and i couldnt see any stars or the moon. theobject remained in the same position for about 10-12 minutes. the wind wasblowing clouds around it so it kind of faded in and out but you could tell itwas clouds. the whole time it was in the sky, i watched it, only taking my eyesoff of it to check for my bus and to check the time. as i was watching it, moreclouds eventually covered it completely and i lost track of it around 9:46pm. my bus arrived shortly after and when i got to work (it was a five minute ride)i checked the sky again, but it wasnt there.
